All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuditContext
Leverages ThreadLocal to share an audit key-value data store across layers of an application for a given HTTP request.
AuditFilter
WebFilter for setting up an AuditContext.
CacheClearTimer
Clear user authorization cache on a schedule.
CacheFilter
WebFilter for setting response cache directives.
CharacterEncodingFilter
WebFilter for setting both request and response character encoding to UTF-8.
ConfigurationParameterInit
A ServletContextListener that provide all environment variables to the ServletContext to allow easy configuration.
Convert
Servlet controller for proxying requests to Puppet Show to allow HTML conversion even for external / public users.
DateIterator
An iterator over a date range.
DateRange
Represents a range of time in millisecond precision.
EmailService
Service for sending emails.
Error
Servlet controller for request errors.
ExceptionUtil
Exception Utilities.
Feedback
Servlet controller for forwarding feedback to interested email addresses.
Functions
Utility functions.
Hall
Represents one of the four experimenter halls at Jefferson Lab.
Help
Servlet controller for showing a help/about page.
InternalException
An Exception with a message that should not be shown to the end user.
IOUtil
IO Utilities.
JPAService<T>
An abstract parent base class for JPA services.
JPAService.OrderDirective
Order Directive for JPA Query.
JPAUtil
JPA Utilities.
LocaleFilter
WebFilter to force English US locale.
Logout
Servlet controller for logout.
ObjectUtil
Object Utilities.
Paginator
A paginator utility.
ParamBuilder
Utility for building a Map of parameters.
ParamConverter
Utility methods for converting parameters.
ParamUtil
Utility methods for combined conversion and validation, with optional default values.
ParamValidator
Utility methods for validating parameters and throwing an IllegalArgumentException if validation fails.
RequestFilter<T>
SQL filter for a given set of request parameters.
ServletUtil
Utilities for handling servlet requests.
Shift
Represents one of the three shifts used at Jefferson Lab by experimenters and operators.
SSORedirect
Servlet controller for Single Sign-On (SSO).
TimeUtil
Time Utilities.
UrlParamHandler<E>
Handles Parameters from a ServletRequest.
User
A simple immutable view of a User entity.
UserAuthorizationCache
Servlet controller for Clearing the user authorization cache.
UserAuthorizationService
User Authorization Service.
UserFriendlyException
A user friendly exception is one in which the message is phrased for users to view directly.
WebApplicationException
A WebApplicationException is designed as a generic Exception, and it is an EJB @ApplicationException so that it is not wrapped when thrown from an EJB.
YnStringToBoolean
JPA Converter for Oracle Boolean to String.
